HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content:
Autoclose Event Notifications will automatically close non-urgent notifications if they have been active for at least 12 in-game hours.

You can enable a message to be displayed when a notification is closed automatically (off by default).

To turn on the message display, go to Menu > Options > Mod Settings.
ACEN can be configured to close good (blue), bad (yellow) and urgent (red) events.\n\nTo choose which notification types to autoclose, go to Menu > Options > Mod Settings.
You may now configure when ACEN closes notifications in the mod's menu (default: after 12 hours).\n\nTo access the mod's menu, go to Mod Settings in RimWorld's Options menu.
